bibl.title: Albert H. Young and Kamasaburo Sugiuro v. Washington State. Appearance.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: National Archives and Records Administration, Seattle Branch, Washington
msIdentifier.collection: RG 21: US District Court, Western Division of Washington, Seatle

div1.p: United States District Court for the Western District of Washington.
In the matter of the Petition of Albert H Young and Kamasaburo Sugiuro alias B.K. Suguria for a writ of Habeas Corpus} No. 2504 Appearance.

To the Clerk of the above Entitled Court: You will please enter our appearance as attorneys for petitioners in the above entitled cause, and service of all subsequent papers, except writs and process, may be made upon said petitioners, by leaving the same with
div1.ab: Robert W. McCelland and Winter S. Martin at Pos Leary Bldg or 540-541 New York Bldg.
div1.p: Notice: - Attorneys will please endorse their own filings. Rule 11
United States District Court Western District of Washington.
Filed in the U.S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington. Jun 19 1913 Frank L. Crosby, Clerk. By EML Deputy.
